data.message:
So let me get this straight. Eminem goes on a station called Black Entertainment Tv, as a white man to preach equality? Am I the only one that sees the irony in this?
Put your fist down Em, you're white. You haven't had a hit song or album since Obamas first term took flight. 
P.S. I drew that line in the sand years ago.

replies.message: then wtf you here for
America.
Yeah, he about 5'6" and little balls
So since I'm white I can't fight for equal rights?..what klan meeting did you learn that from?
Tony Cottle  Don't be a troll. I was born and raised in Southern Africa. The furthest place from your brilliant "klan" comment.
Oh the land of the Apartheid?? Carry on lol
Loïc Gauze Actually Zimbabwe, formerly Rhodesia. Zero apartheid north of South Africa itself.     Little history lesson for you there.

Alright pal I might be the wrong guy to debate with on this specific subject  pal lol Rhodesia has a huge history of racism what's even worse is that was racism on our own lands!! Ever asked yourself why the Rhodesian flag is so popular amongst Neo Nazis ? Remember Dylan storm? Go take a nap dude

Yes, I was thinking of the irony too. So much racial division, that Em's career was even able to exist. NOW, yes now there is racial tension caused by the puppet masters who get rich off of that division. Em is just a puppet punk, sell'n records that spit all their junk.

Loïc Gauze  I was born and raised there  "pal". Rhodesia flourished as a country until Mugabe took rule. It was considered the bread basket of Africa (That's a continent by the way), and built successfully by the hard work of both blacks and whites. The "racism" you speak of came from a civil war with the Guerrillas (not the animals). You sir are in the deep end now with no swimmers on. I suggest you stick to what you know best. You know, like flags and stuff.

😂😂😂 whatever helps you sleep at night of course you would think that things were better for you or your gran daddy before Mugabe no shit... I've been to Harare countless of time my ppl are from the Ivory Coast so again Rhodesia was nothing but an Abomination but I'll stick to what I know right you know flags and stuff you pathetic creature
But pls explain to the rest of us "ignorants" why would Neo Nazi sport your flag and not a senegalese flag for example I'm waiting...It was a country ran by pieces of shit period!!!
I'm still trying to understand why a white man can't preach for equal rights..quit deflecting, you sound like trump
Tony cottle compare the flag on  our lil friend Lee's cover pic and the patch on that  Jacket and you'll understand where his problem is...
He dropped a multi platinum album 2 or 3 years ago. So if you didn't hear it the first time FUCK YOU
Mmlp2~2013 3x Platinum hmmmmmmm🤔
So funny. They got the white boy  to talk shit about TRUMP..
Eminem is a CUCKOLD
White people aren't allowed to fight for equal rights for everyone? That is some pretty fucked up thinking

Prince Muzi Mahlangu  If you're being honest, and let's do that. Both blacks and whites have fled Zim to SA, and all across the world, but for different reasons. I knows this factually. The majority of the whites left due to land reform. A process that would involve being forced from their farms with zero compensation, beatings, rape and many shot dead. The blacks have left because of that result. Most of those lands were given to Mugabes cronies who are completely clueless about farming/agriculture and have now left that country and it's hard working natives starving, jobless and with zero future. Zimbabwes inflation rate is labeled as hyperinflation, and is measured in the hundreds of millions percent. Nobody can survive that lifestyle, and I don't blame any of them for leaving, regardless of race.
Alternative facts???? 😂
Bye...!! But you are big man he has your money already.

Prince Muzi Mahlangu  i am drawing the line! anyone friends with M&M IS A SHIT HEAD. M PERV M IS A TRAITOROUS SCUM BAG AND THE BEST THING FOR THIS COUNTRY IS TO RELOCATE THIS WANNABE GANGSTER BACK TO CUBA. BOYCOTT THIS PIECE OF FILTH, HORRIBLE TALENTLESS CRAP...BURN HIS CDs. NEXT MONTH, IN DC, THERE WILL BE A PUBLIC M FILTH M CD Burning. stay tuned for further updates. If their music is not purchased these vermin remain insignificant.
